data.title: Ronald Pruitt Obituary 2020
data.meta_description: Pruitt, Ronald Thomas  - Age 52, of  Fenton, passed away October 26, 2020 at his residence. Funeral services will be held 4 PM Friday October 30 at Sharp Funeral Homes, Fenton C...
data.text: Pruitt, Ronald Thomas - Age 52, of Fenton, passed away October 26, 2020 at his residence. Funeral services will be held 4 PM Friday October 30 at Sharp Funeral Homes, Fenton Chapel, 1000 Silver Lake Road, Fenton. Visitation will be held 11 AM until the time of service Friday.(for those not attending the live stream may be viewed at Ron's page at www.sharpfuneralhomes.com). Those desiring may make contributions to the Ronald Pruitt Memorial Fund (c/o Sharp Funeral Homes). Ronald was born January 2, 1968 in Taylor, MI. He married Kelly Ann Covey on January 10, 1997. He worked for Daimler Chrysler (DCX). He was a loving and devoted husband, father, grandfather, and son. His family was most important to him. Surviving are: his wife Kelly Ann Pruitt; children, Ashley Renee and husband Nathan Andrew Pokowski, Taylor Nichole and husband Chester DeWayne Holland; Nicholas Ronald Pruitt; grandchildren, Kaylee, Haylee, Ethan, Brandon, Landon, Jessie, Jaylynn, and Easton; mother Marie Martha Bobrowski. He was preceded in death by his grandparents, Clarence and Hattie Bobrowski. Tributes may be shared at www.sharpfuneralhomes.com.
